description: Admissions originating from home/community that are triaged through ED
admission_type_name_examples: Home, ED (Emergency Department), Law Enforcement, Community, Work

description: Admissions coming from various healthcare facilities providing ongoing or transitional care
admission_type_name_examples: Rehab, SNF (Skilled Nursing Facility), LTACH, Transitional Care Unit
Other Hospitals, Acute care hospital, Transfer In

description: Direct admissions from outpatient care environments
admission_type_name_examples: Clinics, Physician Offices, Ambulatory Surgery Centers

description: Planned or prescheduled admissions, often for non-emergency procedures
admission_type_name_examples: Prescheduled Surgeries, Planned Admissions (such as induced baby delivery)

description: Admissions from undefined or less typical sources
